title: Bug Smasher Game
description: A game where a bug hops randomly, and the player clicks to catch it and earn points. Players can reset the bug's speed or score with dedicated buttons.

title: Fraction Calculator
description: This is a GUI app which allows the user to multiply, divide, add and subtract two fractions.

title: Student Information App
description: This is a Java application using JavaFx which allows the user to enter student information.
